s: February 5, 2019 - Nor is it one of the private label brands Amazon has launched. Instead, it is made by Orolay, a company no one has heard of from Zhejiang province in China. Known simply as the “Amazon coat”, Orolay Women’s Thickened Down Jacket sells for $129.99, comes with Prime, and has more than 6,100 reviews rating it 4.2 out of 5 stars.
